titleStmt.title: A true narrative of the undue, and greatly injurious proceedings of one Edward Bullock, late petitioner unto the Parliament of England, against one VVilliam Standen, Esq. humbly presented unto the Parliament of England / by William Ball, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Ball, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
